attributes.action: Intervene on behalf of Tibetan refugees threatened with deportation from Nepal, or to offer them safe asylum in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Press reports say the Nepalese Government plans to deport the Tibetan refugees living in Nepal who have been holding peaceful protests against the Chinese Government. If they are deported, they will face probable arrest and, it is possible, torture.  Should these deportations occur, we, the undersigned, petition our government to intervene on the deportees behalf, either offering them safety and asylum, or via diplomatic means that will allow them to live unharrassed in Nepal.
